ComicInfo.Summary:
Goodbye.
FINAL ISSUE. FOR NOW.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Glory goes to heaven to get her friends back to the world of those who have not died yet. She loses the chance to spend her life after death in Heaven, because of this.
When she gets there, she finds out that her friends don`t wanna go.
Glory`s reunited with someone she loved.
Then she bids goodbye to everyone, and leaves.
She, Nanaja, their sister and their parents go trod the world, search for adventures.
And in a secret location, strange, masked men discuss about the backfiring of their plan. But, it is but a minor delay. Before long, world will find out about The Prophet.
ComicInfo.Tags: Henry,Nanaja,Charon,Demeter,Danger Damsels,Gloria West,Beleszava,Zelda Fitzgerald,Glory,Lord Silverfall,Diehard,Heaven,Riley Barnes
ComicInfo.Title: Glory
